description: The Canadian Forces Health Service Training Centre (CFHSTC), Department of National Defence (DND) requires 1 Learning Designer and 5 Rapid eLearning Courseware Developers.",
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
====================================

**Call for Bids: Learning Designer and Rapid eLearning Courseware Developers**

**Reference Number:** WS4485366714

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** May 7, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** May 23, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Amendment Date:** May 21, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Service

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bidders to provide services for the design and development of learning materials. The successful bidder will be required to provide the following services:

* 1 Learning Designer
* 5 Rapid eLearning Courseware Developers

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is acting as the contracting entity on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for this procurement.

**Anticipated Contract Start Date:** To be determined

**Anticipated Contract End Date:** To be determined

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Eligibility:** This procurement is open to all qualified bidders.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical Merit
* Price

**Submission Requirements:**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on the closing date of May 23, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time). Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

Christopher Casale (SPAC/PSPC)

christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19620155?extsite=MTk2MjAxNTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments:**

None
